name: Single filer at median income
description: Median professional earner at €50,000 in Spain

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 Spanish national IRPF rates and Social Security contributions
sources.notes: National tax: 19% to €12,450, 24% to €20,200, 30% to €35,200, 37% above. Personal allowance €5,550. SS: 6.48%.
